section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-315: § 301 of D.C. Law 24-315 provided that the creation of this section by § 104 of D.C. Law 24-315 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-315: § 301 of D.C. Law 24-315 provided that the creation of this section by § 104 of D.C. Law 24-315 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 8(a) of D.C. Law 25-48 repealed, on a temporary basis, section 301 of D.C. Law 24-315 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore the creation of this section by section 101 of Law 24-315 has been implemented.

Section 3 of D.C. Law 25-109 repealed section 301 of D.C. Law 24-315 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore the creation of this section by section 101 of Law 24-315 has been implemented.
